conversation.message_text: Kathy Kuo: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

Kathy Kuo: You're in! Enjoy up to 25% Off + Free Shipping Over $1000 with code PREZ2026: kathykuohome.attn.tv/a-UrTBJWHPoa . 

Shopping full price? Use code YOUREIN for 10% Off. Exclusions apply.
Kathy Kuo: Save our contact info to never miss exclusive offers and updates!
Kathy Kuo: Hey there, this is Sarah. Thanks for checking out our site! https://kathykuohome.attn.tv/aSd-6qV6YU1y . Are you working on a home design project we can help you with?

My Designer can't get me a discount because she doesn't have a freight company down where I am.  I want to buy the Mullins desk but I really need this discount discounted past the Presidents' Day free shipping...

Kathy Kuo: Thanks for getting in touch! I'm really sorry to hear about that. Currently, we have the code PREZ2026 for up to 25% Off + Free Shipping Over $1000 for items that are ready to ship. Since the Mullins Modern Classic Natural Burl Desk is set to ship at a later date, I'm afraid it's not eligible for the discount code. In this case, you can use the code YOUREIN for 10% Off. Hope this helps! Should you need help with anything else, I'm only a message away!
The you're in isn't working. Doesn't matter I can't go that high - do you foresee this dropping in price ?
YOUREIN *

Kathy Kuo: I understand! Thank you for sharing that. Our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out! In the meantime, you can check out our sales collection here: https://kathykuohome.attn.tv/aOjbj9DC60QH

escalate: Esc inquiries about items not on the site
ESC if the cx missed a sale & wants to take advantage of it
ESC if the customer is asking for a discount and we don't have one
If cx is looking for general recommendations use LFR shortcut and ESC
templates: If cx is building a new home, interested in refurnishing their entire home or rooms in their home, use the IDS shortcut
If cx is shopping for a client use SFC shortcut
Any convo without a positive outcome (out of stock, not on sale, not shipping in time), use DSS shortcut
dos_and_don_ts: For product-specific delivery time-frame inquiries always check the product page for delivery info and share that with the cx
